channel.title: 法新社

item.title: #巴基斯坦--在拉合尔的一个贫民窟，一名拾荒者在用作垃圾堆放场的下水道中寻找可回收垃圾。
item.description:
#Pakistan - A waste picker scouts for recyclable junk from a sewage drain used as a garbage dump, at a slum area in Lahore.
📸Syed MURTAZA #AFP pic.twitter.com/5BxMucZQB8

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 5, 2024

item.title: 从关于原子弹和奥斯威辛集中营的剧情片，到关于玩偶和性爱狂复活尸体的喜剧片，周日奥斯卡最佳影片的竞争者阵容是历年来最多样化的。以下是奥斯卡最佳影片的 10 部竞争者：
item.description:
Top 10.

From dramas about the atomic bomb and Auschwitz, to comedies about dolls and sex-mad reanimated corpses, the lineup of best picture contenders at Sunday's Oscars is the most varied in years.

Here are the 10 contenders for the best picture Oscar: https://t.co/GZii4FP5w8 pic.twitter.com/NBiT2bEXhG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 新研究称，科学家们开发出一种数学模型，可优化 400 米和 1,500 米田径项目选手的训练
item.description:
Scientists have developed a mathematical model to optimise training for competitors in 400-metre and 1,500-metre athletics events, new study sayshttps://t.co/QVMuNHbWbu pic.twitter.com/eEt8YkiKv8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 北约士兵在波兰训练： 北约士兵在波兰训练......作为国防联盟 "龙 24 "演习的一部分，北约部队在波兰 Korzeniewo 跨过维斯瓦河，演习涉及约 4,500 名士兵和近 1,000 辆汽车。龙24 "演习本身是 "坚定卫士24 "演习的一部分，是北约...
item.description:
VIDEO: NATO soldiers train in Poland.

NATO forces cross the Vistula River at Korzeniewo in Poland as part of the defence alliance's Exercise Dragon 24, involving around 4,500 soldiers and almost 1,000 vehicles. Dragon 24 is itself part of Exercise Steadfast Defender 24, NATO's… pic.twitter.com/ZKFL3hcr6x

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 马尔代夫官员称，在命令印度军队撤离后，马尔代夫与中国签署了一项 "军事援助 "协议。马尔代夫称，其与北京签署的 "军事援助 "协议无需付款或收费，但拒绝提供更多细节。
item.description:
The Maldives has signed a "military assistance" deal with China after ordering Indian troops to leave, officials say.

The Maldives says its "military assistance" deal with Beijing comes without payment or charge, but refuses to provide further detailshttps://t.co/CdayidPxuB pic.twitter.com/qPwqmWIRWO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 根据彭博亿万富翁指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index），杰夫-贝佐斯（Jeff Bezos）周一取代埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk），重夺世界首富宝座。
item.description:
Jeff Bezos took back his spot as the world's richest man on Monday, dethroning Elon Musk, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.

Bezos' net worth stands at $200 billion, according to the tracker, surpassing Musk's $198 billionhttps://t.co/XbJkOGfmOY pic.twitter.com/Z1ZNOIvnaH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：战争结束多年后，伊拉克人开始寻找新的沙漠度假胜地。远离大城市的喧嚣和繁华，伊拉克年轻人在经历多年冲突后，越来越多地利用重新获得的安全感，探索该国宁静的沙漠度假胜地。
item.description:
VIDEO: Years removed from war, Iraqis seek new desert escapades.

Far from the hustle and bustle of major cities, young Iraqis are increasingly taking advantage of a renewed sense of safety to explore the country's serene desert getaways after years of conflict pic.twitter.com/0MNgOvaJ55

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #非政府组织称，伊朗去年处决了至少834人，为2015年以来最高
item.description:
#BREAKING Iran executed at least 834 people last year, highest since 2015, say NGOs pic.twitter.com/Zub0hHTiUh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在亚马逊河畔，孩子们互相抛掷芒果，这种童年的消遣在巴西已变成了一种正式的体育运动，甚至在里约热内卢令人称道的沙滩运动中也占有一席之地。
item.description:
Brazil sinks its teeth into mango-inspired ballgame.

A childhood pastime of kids tossing mangoes to each other in the Amazon has transformed into a proper sport in Brazil, even finding a place among the vaunted beach games played in Rio de Janeirohttps://t.co/GymSWKRnpY pic.twitter.com/gaC24tAdOR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：随着美国竞选活动的展开，沙斯塔县放弃了电子投票机。由于怀疑以前的选举（包括 2020 年的投票）被窃取，沙斯塔县监事会决定终止租用 Dominion 投票机的合同，...
item.description:
VIDEO: Shasta County ditches electronic voting machines as US campaign unfolds.

Based on suspicions that previous elections were stolen, including the 2020 vote, the Shasta County's Board of Supervisors has decided to end a contract for their lease of Dominion voting machines,… pic.twitter.com/Ik7aTxDVMP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 全国人民代表大会将在为期一周的会议中重点讨论经济和安全挑战。
item.description:
China sets a growth target of 5% - a far cry from the double-digit expansion that for years drove the world's second-largest economy.

The National People's Congress is set to focus on economic and security challenges during the week-long conclavehttps://t.co/fnopf1VCWU pic.twitter.com/PJGMwVQDIO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在世界第二大经济体面临严峻挑战之际，中国共产党高层官员将在年度会议上公布数十年来最低的增长目标。
item.description:
China is set to unveil some of its lowest growth targets in decades when top Communist Party officials begin an annual meeting as the world's second largest economy faces dire headwinds.https://t.co/KHR4LeL3GV pic.twitter.com/Chraz0TPi8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 以色列召回了其驻联合国大使，因为对哈马斯武装分子在 10 月 7 日袭击中性侵指控的处理引发了紧张局势。

item.title: 推特公司前高管起诉埃隆-马斯克，称这位亿万富翁在接管这家社交媒体公司并解雇他们之后，没有向他们支付近 1.3 亿美元。
item.description:

item.title: 一位美国特使说，外交解决方案是结束以色列-哈马斯战争爆发后黎巴嫩真主党与以色列之间近五个月来愈演愈烈的敌对行动的关键。
item.description:
A US envoy said a diplomatic solution was key to ending nearly five months of intensifying hostilities between Lebanon's Hezbollah and Israel after the eruption of the Israel-Hamas war.https://t.co/Rc1SZbIrql pic.twitter.com/m8NTpMAaSq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）批评古巴禁止著名活动家玛莎-比阿特丽斯-罗克（Martha Beatriz Roque）访问白宫领奖。
item.description:

item.title: 在多年冲突之后，一场马匹繁育比赛让来自四分五裂的利比亚各地的马术爱好者汇聚一堂，展现了罕见的团结。
item.description:
A horse breeding competition has brought together equestrians from across divided Libya in a rare show of unity after years of conflict.https://t.co/AefHuo1b0Y pic.twitter.com/Nje1ifRHFr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统宣布将关闭被他称为前左派政府 "宣传 "喉舌的国家通讯社 Telam 之后，阿根廷政府暂停了 Telam 的运营。
item.description:
Argentina's government suspended the Telam state news agency in the wake of an announcement by President Javier Milei that he would shut down what he called a mouthpiece of "propaganda" for previous leftist administrations.https://t.co/lp6ljW1UWL pic.twitter.com/fa3IzSCKUx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 透视装的潮流主导了巴黎时装周，这表明尽管存在实际甚至法律方面的挑战，但人们对暴露服装的需求依然强劲。
item.description:
The trend for see-through clothes has dominated Paris Fashion Week, showing that demand for revealing outfits is still going strong despite practical and even legal challenges.https://t.co/1NyW7fBcoY pic.twitter.com/WX1pDe4PNG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 加沙的医院饱受打击、围困和袭击之苦，但在日常工作中，巴勒斯坦领土上严重的电力短缺对救生护理工作构成了持久的威胁。
item.description:
Gaza's hospitals have been wracked by strikes, sieges and raids, but on a day-to-day basis, it is the Palestinian territory's acute power shortages that pose an enduring risk to life-saving care.https://t.co/AcsHB5PAmw pic.twitter.com/yXUTUIDQTq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 4, 2024
